title: Passamaquoddy Legends
description: Millennia before Europeans arrived in North America......the first human was created from a bolt of lightning!Who was this universal symbol of the Algonquin-speaking world?Glooskap - which means "man from nothing".Native Americans lived in the northeast United States and Canada for over 10,000 years. But what is a Passamaquoddy?Passamaquoddy is a Maine Indian Tribe from the anglicized Wabanaki peskotomuhkatiyik meaning "people who spear pollock".Like most preliterate societies, the Passamaquoddy maintained their rich cultural heritage via oral traditions and expressions including songs, poems, prayers, and dances.Glooskap - the divinity, Lox - the mischief-maker, and Master Rabbit are just a few of the ancient legends proudly included in the tapestry of North American Folklore.If you love Native American Mythology, you will love this book.Get it now.
author: Charles Godfrey Leland
